title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. The page looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields are displayed as text fields that can be edited by the user.
EB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields should be displayed as readonly labels instead of editable text fields.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Project Properties dialog. 
2. Navigate to the Info page. 
3. Observe that the fields on this page appear as editable text fields instead of readonly labels.
